name: @email-gateway/cloudflare-worker
description: A Cloudflare Worker for a private email gateway, integrating email-alias-core and email-scrubber-core.

scripts.build: pnpm run clean && pnpm run build:worker
scripts.type-check:all: pnpm run type-check && pnpm run type-check:test
scripts.check: pnpm run format && pnpm run type-check:all && pnpm run lint && pnpm run test
scripts.check:ci: pnpm run type-check:all && pnpm run lint:ci && pnpm run test
scripts.ci: pnpm run check:ci && pnpm run build
scripts.validate: pnpm run check && pnpm run build

_scripts_documentation.type-check: Check TypeScript types for source files only
_scripts_documentation.type-check:test: Check TypeScript types for test files only
_scripts_documentation.type-check:all: Check TypeScript types for both source and test files
_scripts_documentation.lint: Check code quality and formatting using Biome
_scripts_documentation.lint:unsafe_fix: Fix auto-fixable linting issues including unsafe fixes
_scripts_documentation.test: Run Jest tests with ES modules support
_scripts_documentation.check: Run all checks (format, types, lint, tests) - for development
_scripts_documentation.check:ci: Run all checks (types, lint, tests) for CI/CD
_scripts_documentation.ci: Run all CI checks including build - for CI/CD
_scripts_documentation.validate: Run all CI checks including build - for development
_scripts_documentation.prepublishOnly: Runs before npm publish to ensure quality
